protocol.text: ds cDNA synthesis: SuperScript Choice System from Invitrogen ds cDNA cleanup: GeneChip Sample Cleanup Module from Affymetrix cRNA synthesis: Bioarray High-Yield RNA Transcript Labeling Kit from Enzo Biochem. UTP and CTP is biotinylated cRNA cleanup: GeneChip Sample Cleanup Module from Affymetrix
Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Prep Kit
